long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move your character with arrow keys or W S A D. To shoot it is spacebar. You have to shoot the grey and orange blocks. If you shoot a grey block it is +1 health if you shoot a orange block it is a +5 health. If or when you let a block go down the screen fully you get -1 health.
